readable.title: 3171188674_717eee0183
readable.content: A city worker with the bright yellow vest is looking intot he crowd of people on the side of a busy street . A security person in lime green monitors the busy city streets . A woman wearing a bright yellow jacket and hat stands on a busy street while others walk by . A woman with a yellow jacket and matching hat watching as people walk by her . Person in neon green jacket and hat standing on sidewalk while people walk by
